Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered 5d agoYeah pretty much. You are passing money to the financial advisor and letting them make the decisions of where to invest in your money according to your risk profile.You can choose to withdraw money from the platform anytime but not choose which specific underlying holding to sell or buy, that's their decision to make.So it would be best you try not to look at your account too often. And trust the investment methodology the financial advisor has which got you to trust them with your money in the first place.1 comment2
